level.heading: Exemption for veterans.
level.text: ยง 11-245.45 Exemption for veterans. Pursuant to paragraph (d) of subdivision eight of section four hundred fifty-eight of the real property tax law, the city hereby authorizes real property owned by a cooperative apartment corporation to be exempt from taxation in accordance with such section and any local laws adopted pursuant to such section beginning July first, nineteen hundred ninety-eight.
